PostData.Author: sumit
PostData.PostTitle: A young man and his date

PostsInfoRow.PostContent:
A young man and his date were parked on a back road some distance from town. They were about to have sex when the girl stopped.

"I really should have mentioned this earlier, but I'm actually a hooker and I charge $20 for sex." The man reluctantly paid her, and they did their thing.

After a cigarette, the man just sat in the driver's seat looking out the window. "Why aren't we going anywhere?" asked the girl.

"Well, I should have mentioned this before, but I'm actually a taxi driver, and the fare back to town is $25..."

Ab bheem nishana lagata hain ..

fir se chookta hain aur wo bhi bolta hain  'maa ki chut nishana gaya chook'...


Is bar Dronacharya aag babula ho jaate hain .. ki ab kisi ne ye bola to aasman se ek teer aayega aur uski gaand main ghus jayega


Ab dharamraj yudhistar nishana lagata hain .. fir se nishana chookta hain aur wo bhi bolta hain 'maa ki chut nishana gaya chook' ..


Fir aasman se ek teer aata hain aur dronacharya ki gaand main ghus jaata hain .. aur ek aakashwani hoti hain 'maa ki chut nishana gaya chook'.

Vicky meets Aashima in an elevator. "Where are you heading today?" Vicky asks.

"I'm going down to donate blood."

"How much do you get paid for donating blood?"

"About Rs. 1000."

"Wow," says Vicky, "I'm going up to donate sperm, and the sperm bank pays Rs. 5000." Aashima angrily gets off the elevator.

The next day, Vicky and Aashima meet in the elevator again.

"Nice to meet you again. Where are you going today?"

"Sperm bank," she says with her mouth full.
